resources.string: Welcome to the Family Relationships Learning App!
“Click on a name to learn more about their relations”

Andrew is the father to: Michael
 Andrew is the in-law to: James
 Andrew is the brother to: Susan
 Andrew is the son to: Henry
 Andrew is the uncle to: Oliver, Emma
 Andrew is the husband of: Sarah

Emma is the sister to: Oliver
 Emma is the daughter to: James, Susan
 Emma is the granddaughter to: Henry
 Emma is the cousin to: Michael
 Emma is the niece to: Sarah, Andrew
Henry is the father to: Susan, Andrew\n Henry is the in-law to: James, Sarah\n Henry is the grandfather to: Oliver, Michael, Emma

James is the father to: Oliver, Emma
 James is the in-law to: Sarah, Andrew, Henry
 James is the Uncle to: Michael
 James is the husband of: Susan

Michael is the son to: Andrew, Sarah
 Michael is the grandson to: Henry
 Michael is the cousin to: Oliver, Emma
 Michael is the nephew to: James, Susan

Oliver is the brother to: Emma
 Oliver is the son to: James, Susan
 Oliver is the grandson to: Henry
 Oliver is the cousin to: Michael
 Oliver is the nephew to: Sarah, Andrew

Sarah is the mother to: Michael
 Sarah is the in-law to: James, Henry, Susan
 Sarah is the aunt to: Oliver, Emma
 Sarah is the wife of: Andrew

Susan is the mother to: Oliver, Emma
 Susan is the in-law to: Sarah
 Susan is the sister to: Andrew
 Susan is the daughter to: Henry
 Susan is the aunt to: Michael
 Susan is the wife of: James
